\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{Message:Message.Message}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{class }}\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Message.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{Message}}}{\emph{\DUrole{n}{conn\_socket}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{task}}, \emph{\DUrole{n}{request}}}{}
Bases: \sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{object}}

This is the class to handle Encryption of messages. The format in which the message is sent to server is determined in this class
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{task}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} Task to be done. It can have the values signup, login, send\_message

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{socket}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{socket.socket}}) \textendash{} The socket used for connection with Server

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{request\_content}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{dict}}) \textendash{} Content to include in the request to send to server

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{\_data\_to\_send}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bytes}}) \textendash{} Contains the data to send to the server

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{\_recvd\_msg}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bytes}}) \textendash{} Content recieved from server is stored here

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

Constructor Object
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{conn\_socket}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{socket.socket}}) \textendash{} Socket which has a connection with server

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{task}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}) \textendash{} Task to do. It can have values: login, signup, send\_message

\index{\_login() (Message.Message method)@\spxentry{\_login()}\spxextra{Message.Message method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{Message:Message.Message._login}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{\_login}}}{}{}
Function to help login into the system. This function sends the login details to the server |
The function expects to recieve a response of size 2 from server which gives 0 if invalid id/password and 1 if successful login and 2 for any other case
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
Response from server converted to int

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
int

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{\_signup() (Message.Message method)@\spxentry{\_signup()}\spxextra{Message.Message method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{Message:Message.Message._signup}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{\_signup}}}{}{}
Function to help signup to make new account. This function sends the new user details to the server |
The function expects to recieve a response of size 2 from server which gives 0 if username already taken and 1 if successful login and 2 for any other case
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
Response from server converted to int

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
int

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}
